ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Procurement and Logistics Service, Social Care Procurement Unit

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Procurement and Logistics Service, Social Care Procurement Unit
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Pinewood Villa, Longstone Hospital, 73 Loughgall Road

SHORT_DESCR.P: The HSCB wishes to tender for an Early Intervention Family Support Project to support children aged 8-13 years (and their families) who are:
— deemed vulnerable to poor outcomes in terms of the 8 parameters of wellbeing set out in the children’s services cooperation act and draft children’s strategy 2017-27,
— experiencing difficulty in the education system, at home or in the community, and
— require a multi-agency response to meet their needs.

In this context the service will, in addition to direct interventions, also, work collaboratively with a range of statutory and non-statutory support services that can best address the identified needs and promote the safety and wellbeing of referred children, young people and their families. This tender is offered in 5 Lots – each covering one of the 5 HSC Trusts areas. The service will be part of the developing early intervention infrastructure in the Lot area and will link closely with the family support hubs in each area.
The HSCB wishes to tender for an early intervention family support project to support children aged 8-13 years (and their families) who are:
— deemed vulnerable to poor outcomes in terms of the 8 parameters of wellbeing set out in the children’s services cooperation act and draft children’s Strategy 2017-27,
— experiencing difficulty in the education system, at home or in the community, and

— require a multi-agency response to meet their needs. In this context the service will, in addition to direct interventions, also, work collaboratively with a range of statutory and non-statutory support services that can best address the identified needs and promote the safety and wellbeing of referred children, young people and their families.

This tender is offered in 5 Lots – each covering one of the 5 HSC Trusts areas. The service will be part of the developing early intervention infrastructure in the Lot area and will link closely with the family support hubs in each area.

INFO_ADD.P: The initial contract is 36 months with the potential to extend for 2 x 12 months periods. The. estimated.. value of this contract for 3 years is 670 050 GBP if the extensions were invoked the value could potentially be 1 116 750 GBP. There is also potential for a 40 % uplift in programme and activity costs as stated in the B document therefore the value could range from 670 050 GBP to 1 563 450 GBP.
